metadata.name: Space Soldier
metadata.description:
SPACE SOLDIER - In the early Imperial Era, space soldiers were the most common soldiers in the Imperial Army, used as assault and police forces throughout the Galactic Empire. Gradually, over the years, their methods have become more and more violent and their good image among the population has deteriorated.


KOSMOS PROJECT 
KOSMOS is a collection of 1/1 NFT all hand drawn and totally unique. Each card represents a character from the KOSMOS universe and is modeled in 3D.

Every bidder of the KOSMOS collection will receive a NFT with the card they bid for. When you own a KOSMOS card, you will also receive a 15x5cm metal card. This physical card will allow you to display your NFT in a unique way using augmented reality.

For more information go to : https://project-kosmos.com/
